describe: Ukraine is a country in Eastern Europe, known for its rich history, diverse culture, and beautiful landscapes. It is the second-largest country in Europe and has a population of over 40 million people. Ukraine is famous for its vibrant cities, traditional cuisine, and historical landmarks.

cities.name: üåÜ Kyiv
cities.geographical_location: Located in north-central Ukraine along the Dnieper River.
cities.climate: Kyiv has a humid continental climate with cold winters and warm summers.

cities.name: üåÜ Lviv
cities.geographical_location: Situated in western Ukraine, near the border with Poland.
cities.climate: Lviv experiences a humid continental climate with mild summers and cold, snowy winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Lviv Cheesecake, Banosh, and Galician-style dishes.

cities.name: üèù Odessa
cities.geographical_location: Located on the northwestern shore of the Black Sea.
cities.climate: Odessa has a humid subtropical climate with mild winters and hot, dry summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Odessa-style fish, Forcemeat-stuffed cabbage rolls, and Black Sea mussels.

cities.name: üå≥ Kharkiv
cities.climate: Kharkiv has a humid continental climate with cold winters and warm summers.
